Articles.Content:
sorry but the screenshot dooesnt works

Edited August 17, 2013 by jbaltus123
doesnt works sorry
It appears you have not uploaded your photo to the Internet. You need to use an image hosting site, then link us to it.

Screenshots shouldn't be in the Fan-Art section anyways. Post them in the "Show Off Your Awesome KSP Pictures" thread dedicated to just screenshots. This board is for animations, drawings, sketches and the like.
